title: The Wheelwright
creator_credit: Worshipful Company of Wheelwright, G. Buckland-Smith and David Cons
brief_description: Film of one of the few remaining wheelwrights in Britain making a wheel. This is contrasted with the making of wheels for modern motor cars.
creator_credit_for_label: Worshipful Company of Wheelwright, G. Buckland-Smith and David Cons
